attributes.additional_details: We are a family of six like many uk family’s we have already paid 9k for a much needed family holiday and now there ask us to pay £780 for a test for my family outbound and again inbound would be another £780 that will be £1560 on top of the 9k we have already paid . To me this is people making money out of this pandemic. When people have suffered enough . My children like most children have Suffered greatly through this pandemic and I think it’s absolutely ridiculous on how much they are charging people for these tests
attributes.background: Free tests or a affordable price (£20-£30) per Person

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Scrap the compulsory £210 home test kit when arriving in U.K.: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577580

Fund free hotel quarantine and testing for all UK arrivals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575118
